question: This government economy has emerged as the world's fifth largest, as per new federal data revealed on 4th May 2018.
explanation: California's economy has surpassed the economy of United Kingdom. California's gross domestic product increased by $127 billion from 2016 to 2017. California's economy is concentrated in coastal regions around San Francisco, San Jose, Los Angeles and San Diego. California's economy is now only behind the economy of the United States, China, Japan and Germany.
